  labels = {["static"]}>

### getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch() {#a74712012450beeec949c228fd21d10a6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static BranchInst &#42; getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Checks if <code>L</code> has an exiting latch branch.

There may also be other exiting blocks. Returns branch instruction terminating the loop latch if above check is successful, nullptr otherwise.

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loop passes are designed to run inside of a loop pass manager which means</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that any function analyses they require must be required by the first loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pass in the manager (so that it is computed before the loop pass manager</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reasonably robust, the set needed for most loop passes is maintained here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Set input string into loop metadata by keeping other values intact.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the string is already in loop metadata update value if it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">/// different.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a55c9054d63d1c6a39e9c09ba13a482fa"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a55c9054d63d1c6a39e9c09ba13a482fa">llvm::addStringMetadataToLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;TheLoop, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;StringMD,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the loop already has metadata, retain it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;LoopID = TheLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop/#afbcd78588d5235f99698b5c30f591382">getLoopID</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoopID) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 1, ie = LoopID-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#aa4068e37ec583962685e3567dc102ae5">getNumOperands</a>(); i &lt; ie; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Preheader &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Preheader should exist!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MemorySSAUpdater&gt; MSSAU;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MSSA)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">    MSSAU = std::make&#95;unique&lt;MemorySSAUpdater&gt;(MSSA);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now that we know the removal is safe, remove the loop by changing the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branch from the preheader to go to the single exit block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Because we&#39;re deleting a large chunk of code at once, the sequence in which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we remove things is very important to avoid invalidation issues.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Tell ScalarEvolution that the loop is deleted. Do this before</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// deleting the loop so that ScalarEvolution can look at the loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to determine what it needs to clean up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SE) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a592bdd7731b14ff4ff5d646f6f399900">forgetLoop</a>(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a830ba09d5969cd66878b05c17fdf66b6">forgetBlockAndLoopDispositions</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;OldTerm = Preheader-&gt;getTerminator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!OldTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6ea260be710ac7b61309534308da3147">mayHaveSideEffects</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Preheader must end with a side-effect-free terminator&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OldTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a3287172f2d13af086e6d66364e8c6de3">getNumSuccessors</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Preheader must have a single successor&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Connect the preheader to the exit block. Keep the old edge to the header</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// around to perform the dominator tree update in two separate steps</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -- #1 insertion of the edge preheader -&gt; exit and #2 deletion of the edge</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// preheader -&gt; header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0  Preheader          1  Preheader           2  Preheader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        |                    |   |                   |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        V                    |   V                   |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      Header &lt;--\\            | Header &lt;--\\           | Header &lt;--\\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="comment">  //       |  |     |            |  |  |     |           |  |  |     |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       |  V     |            |  |  V     |           |  |  V     |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       | Body --/            |  | Body --/           |  | Body --/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       V                     V  V                    V  V</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      Exit                   Exit                    Exit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By doing this is two separate steps we can perform the dominator tree</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// update without using the batch update API.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Even when the loop is never executed, we cannot remove the edge from the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// source block to the exit block. Consider the case where the unexecuted loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branches back to an outer loop. If we deleted the loop and removed the edge</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// coming to this inner loop, this will break the outer loop structure (by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// deleting the backedge of the outer loop). If the outer loop is indeed a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-loop, it will be deleted in a future iteration of loop deletion pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(OldTerm);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DVI)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DeadDebugSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a1b0f3ebdced8fce4b22c6a63b25d9525">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a>(DVI)).second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// After the loop has been deleted all the values defined and modified</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inside the loop are going to be unavailable. Values computed in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop will have been deleted, automatically causing their debug uses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be be replaced with undef. Loop invariant values will still be available.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move dbg.values out the loop so that earlier location ranges are still</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// terminated and loop invariant assignments are preserved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dibuilder">DIBuilder</a> DIB(&#42;ExitBlock-&gt;getModule());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">        ExitBlock-&gt;getFirstInsertionPt();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;There should be a non-PHI instruction in exit block, else these &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Due to the &quot;head&quot; bit in BasicBlock::iterator, we&#39;re going to insert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// each DbgVariableRecord right at the start of the block, wheras dbg.values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// would be repeatedly inserted before the first instruction. To replicate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this behaviour, do it backwards.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((LatchBR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) == L-&gt;getHeader() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the estimated trip count for any exiting branch which dominates</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the loop latch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823" lineLink="#a0d49831d7116d82b2d53c2bbb81cd12d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="#a0d49831d7116d82b2d53c2bbb81cd12d">getEstimatedTripCount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;ExitingBranch,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                     uint64&#95;t &amp;OrigExitWeight) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To estimate the number of times the loop body was executed, we want to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// know the number of times the backedge was taken, vs. the number of times</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we exited the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t LoopWeight, ExitWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(&#42;ExitingBranch, LoopWeight, ExitWeight))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (L-&gt;contains(ExitingBranch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(LoopWeight, ExitWeight);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ExitWeight)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t have a way to return predicated infinite</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><Highlight kind="normal">  OrigExitWeight = ExitWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Estimated exit count is a ratio of the loop weight by the weight of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edge exiting the loop, rounded to nearest.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ExitCount = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5c8c0b408c713614c36293a08c0a5203">llvm::divideNearest</a>(LoopWeight, ExitWeight);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Estimated trip count is one plus estimated exit count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExitCount + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b3c6dc8e7df65d2385acfe9657abd03"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b3c6dc8e7df65d2385acfe9657abd03">llvm::getLoopEstimatedTripCount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;EstimatedLoopInvocationWeight) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently we take the estimate exit count only from the loop latch,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ignoring other exiting blocks.  This can overestimate the trip count</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if we exit through another exit, but can never underestimate it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: incorporate information from other exits</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;LatchBranch = <a href="#a74712012450beeec949c228fd21d10a6">getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch</a>(L)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t ExitWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; EstTripCount =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="#a0d49831d7116d82b2d53c2bbb81cd12d">getEstimatedTripCount</a>(LatchBranch, L, ExitWeight)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EstimatedLoopInvocationWeight)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;EstimatedLoopInvocationWeight = ExitWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;EstTripCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad7cd933f586fc0c66656a4751ac069f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad7cd933f586fc0c66656a4751ac069f">llvm::setLoopEstimatedTripCount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EstimatedTripCount,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EstimatedloopInvocationWeight) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At the moment, we currently support changing the estimate trip count of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the latch branch only.  We could extend this API to manipulate estimated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// trip counts for any exit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;LatchBranch = <a href="#a74712012450beeec949c228fd21d10a6">getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch</a>(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LatchBranch)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate taken and exit weights.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LatchExitWeight = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BackedgeTakenWeight = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EstimatedTripCount &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal">    LatchExitWeight = EstimatedloopInvocationWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">    BackedgeTakenWeight = (EstimatedTripCount - 1) &#42; LatchExitWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make a swap if back edge is taken when condition is &quot;false&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LatchBranch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) != L-&gt;getHeader())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(BackedgeTakenWeight, LatchExitWeight);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdbuilder">MDBuilder</a> MDB(LatchBranch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set/Update profile metadata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">  LatchBranch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a9247a212ea89acc9573fa7e7f557eaba">setMetadata</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac438183b3cdb70d2fa78265512238514"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac438183b3cdb70d2fa78265512238514">llvm::hasIterationCountInvariantInParent</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;InnerLoop,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// e.g. ((((Acc + Scl&#91;0&#93;) + Scl&#91;1&#93;) + Scl&#91;2&#93;) + ) ... + Scl&#91;VF-1&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExtractIdx = 0; ExtractIdx != VF; ++ExtractIdx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Ext =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> != Instruction::ICmp &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> != Instruction::FCmp) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aba5d97f3a14427982c1b86dafd033320">CreateBinOp</a>((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ac26154a24f393f523c87cc5f8239f36c">Instruction::BinaryOps</a>)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, Result, Ext,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helper to generate a log2 shuffle reduction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a0692c75c1b45226b6afb90ad609eb86a">TargetTransformInfo::ReductionShuffle</a> RS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830e">RecurKind</a> RdxKind) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Src-&gt;getType())-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VF is a power of 2 so we can emit the reduction using log2(VF) shuffles</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and vector ops, reducing the set of values being computed by half each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// round.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(VF) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Reduction emission only supported for pow2 vectors!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: fast-math-flags flags are controlled by the builder configuration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and are assumed to apply to all generated arithmetic instructions.  Other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// poison generating flags (nsw/nuw/inbounds/inrange/exact) are not part</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the builder configuration, and since they&#39;re not passed explicitly,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will never be relevant here.  Note that it would be generally unsound to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// propagate these from an intrinsic call to the expansion anyways as we/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// change the order of operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 32&gt;</a> ShuffleMask(VF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> stride = 1; stride &lt; VF; stride &lt;&lt;= 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialise the mask with undef.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::fill(ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>(), ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(), -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = 0; j &lt; VF; j += stride &lt;&lt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><Highlight kind="normal">        ShuffleMask&#91;j&#93; = j + stride;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 32&gt;</a> ShuffleMask(VF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = VF; i != 1; i &gt;&gt;= 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move the upper half of the vector to the lower half.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = 0; j != i / 2; ++j)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><Highlight kind="normal">        ShuffleMask&#91;j&#93; = i / 2 + j;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fill the rest of the mask with undef.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::fill(&amp;ShuffleMask&#91;i / 2&#93;, ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(), -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><Highlight kind="normal">      BuildShuffledOp(ShuffleMask, TmpVec);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If any predicate is true it means that we want to select the new value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;AnyOf =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><Highlight kind="normal">      Src-&gt;getType()-&gt;isVectorTy() ? Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a784d99f22cf1632638a2fa652e7723d1">CreateOrReduce</a>(Src) : Src;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The compares in the loop may yield poison, which propagates through the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rewriteLoopExitValues - Optimize IV users outside the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// As a side effect, reduces the amount of IV processing within the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443" lineLink="#a0f31e8ea7a0fea18c2df924e7d6e8de8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a0f31e8ea7a0fea18c2df924e7d6e8de8">hasHardUserWithinLoop</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Visited;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> WorkList;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">  Visited.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">  WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Curr = WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This use is outside the loop, nothing to do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!L-&gt;contains(Curr))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do we assume it is a &quot;hard&quot; use which will not be eliminated easily?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Curr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6ea260be710ac7b61309534308da3147">mayHaveSideEffects</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Computing the value outside of the loop brings no benefit if it is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// definitely used inside the loop in a way which can not be optimized</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// away. Avoid doing so unless we know we have a value which computes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Utility that implements appending of loops onto a worklist.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Loops are added in preorder (analogous for reverse postorder for trees),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and the worklist is processed LIFO.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RangeT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><Highlight kind="comment">/// IR Values for the lower and upper bounds of a pointer evolution.  We</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><Highlight kind="comment">/// need to use value-handles because SCEV expansion can invalidate previously</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><Highlight kind="comment">/// expanded values.  Thus expansion of a pointer can invalidate the bounds for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a previous one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds">PointerBounds</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds/#a166c50543bde92f88942e24117d2507c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingvh">TrackingVH&lt;Value&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds/#a166c50543bde92f88942e24117d2507c">Start</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds/#a1b8c6c0bae373b4653e16639ac4acff7"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingvh">TrackingVH&lt;Value&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds/#a1b8c6c0bae373b4653e16639ac4acff7">End</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds/#aae56c5255d0c8015537a9e0dd7a93e31"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds/#aae56c5255d0c8015537a9e0dd7a93e31">StrideToCheck</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Expand code for the lower and upper bound of the pointer group \\p CG</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in \\p TheLoop.  \\return the values for the bounds.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866" lineLink="#a43288882d546aed1ef0a23ffc620ddff"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds">PointerBounds</a> <a href="#a43288882d546aed1ef0a23ffc620ddff">expandBounds</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/runtimecheckingptrgroup">RuntimeCheckingPtrGroup</a> &#42;CG,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;TheLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp;Exp, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#a8b4f30b1176e1eebdd8b4998f66e97ef">HoistRuntimeChecks</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>-&gt;getContext();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;PtrArithTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype/#a8d7f800be5fd53dcfcdcbdc6fd9ccfe3">PointerType::get</a>(Ctx, CG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/runtimecheckingptrgroup/#a09ba5cdd25cec4e4080aa882557b708d">AddressSpace</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Start = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &#42;End = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;LAA: Adding RT check for range:\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05609d049bfe3c5c2f64711566131a86a28d0edd045e05cf5af64e35ae0c4c6ef">Low</a> = CG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/runtimecheckingptrgroup/#afac0830f0932768a1e5059fa696f1be1">Low</a>, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a7df34dbf636f2fbbb00f2b86eccdb1eb">High</a> = CG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/runtimecheckingptrgroup/#a4c6c88b61312f50f0375ba8637590f5e">High</a>, &#42;Stride = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the Low and High values are themselves loop-variant, then we may want</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to expand the range to include those covered by the outer loop as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is a trade-off here with the advantage being that creating checks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// using the expanded range permits the runtime memory checks to be hoisted</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// out of the outer loop. This reduces the cost of entering the inner loop,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which can be significant for low trip counts. The disadvantage is that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is a chance we may now never enter the vectorized inner loop,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whereas using a restricted range check could have allowed us to enter at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// least once. This is why the behaviour is not currently the default and is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// controlled by the parameter &#39;HoistRuntimeChecks&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#a8b4f30b1176e1eebdd8b4998f66e97ef">HoistRuntimeChecks</a> &amp;&amp; TheLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
